title: sujonali1819
author: sujonali1819
created_time: June 30, 2023, 06:53:33 AMLast edit: August 08, 2023, 09:13:06 AM by sujonali1819
content: Bounty pool is escrowed by shasan 0x74894513e0eD3722Cc0ab977C4610Ff18300f55FQuote from: sujonali1819 on August 03, 2023, 02:33:52 PMThe team is extending the bounty for two more weeks.03/08/2023 - 09/08/202310/08/2023 - 16/08/2023If you are a writer, video developer, designer, or influencer; this campaign is for you.The campaign is divided into the following tasks and rules.                              The bounty will be managed by TDVToken team. I am just hired to post the bounty thread only. If you have any issues regarding this campaign please contact TDVToken and make sure you have joined on @tdvrewardmarketingcampaign telegram group for support.Quote from: shasan on July 08, 2023, 02:24:36 PMThis is shasandate: 7th AugustI will hold The payment of the bounty campaign as escrow to the wallet 0x74894513e0eD3722Cc0ab977C4610Ff18300f55FEdit:I am responsible only for the token. I am not part of the project. Anyone who wants to invest in this project should do that at his/her own risk. I will only be responsible for the fund which I will hold for the participants.Code:Message: This is shasandate: 7th AugustI will hold The payment of the bounty campaign as escrow to the wallet 0x74894513e0eD3722Cc0ab977C4610Ff18300f55FWallte: bc1qe49zeuwmg8whqa26jgn5pzm6ul4fzpdccz9s4lSignature: IBQDn0LlY9lCn3xDFNFQrscirEqcvINvoEt6tRkYS4Vqd/Fi22Hjt9aX76lkByTo5dZUTZfhtjstazEVhGtKqHc=

comments.body: Quote from: sujonali1819 on July 25, 2023, 05:58:22 AMDue to a lack of participants in the article and Video campaigns, the team wants to separate the video and article campaigns. Which will be called Video and article campaign. Campaign link - https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5460954.msg62598694#msg62598694Note:  Budget will be also divided 50%/50% for the social media campaign and Video/article campaign.
